summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Blocks 21 and 22, Supplemental Plat to Crown Addition and 2nd Supplemental Plat to Crown Addition, being the alley from West Blaine Street to West Garfield Street, between 10th Avenue West and 11th Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 108596 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
